messages.message: @Abhishek Looks like this happens in your local env? We are investigating some on going issues of 504 errors, but do you start seeing this recently? And is ENABLE_FILE_SERVICE_V2 set in your local env?
yes this came 3 days back , previously everything was working. ENABLE_FILE_SERVICE_V2 is enabled in env-local
Got it, this may have to do with what we have seen on prod. For now, try disable ENABLE_FILE_SERVICE_V2 and re-build relevant services.
rebuild all images from scratch by deleting the cache layers and then set the file_service_v2 to false but still the same errors

```[2021-10-18 14:15:34,413] {/Users/abhishekchaudhary/instabase/webserver/api-server-apps/build/py/instabase/utils/web/handler_util.py:80} ERROR - Received exception in WEBAPP JSON request: Error=Unknown exception executing method for service RepoService. Traceback=Traceback (most recent call last):;File "/Users/abhishekchaudhary/instabase/webserver/api-server-apps/build/py/instabase/utils/web/handler_util.py", line 74, in inner_func;return f(*args, **kwargs);File "/Users/abhishekchaudhary/instabase/webserver/api-server-apps/build/py/instabase/utils/oauth2/oauth2.py", line 136, in wrapped_f;return f(*args, **kwargs);File "/Users/abhishekchaudhary/instabase/webserver/api-server-apps/build/py/instabase/tracing/flask.py", line 128, in wrapped;raise error;File "/Users/abhishekchaudhary/instabase/webserver/api-server-apps/build/py/instabase/tracing/flask.py", line 123, in wrapped;r = func(*args, **kwargs);File "/Users/abhishekchaudhary/instabase/webserver/api-server-apps/build/py/instabase/handler/api/v1/marketplace.py", line 142, in get;name_arg);File "/Users/abhishekchaudhary/instabase/webserver/api-server-apps/build/py/instabase/tracing/utils.py", line 299, in wrapped;raise error;File "/Users/abhishekchaudhary/instabase/webserver/api-server-apps/build/py/instabase/tracing/utils.py", line 294, in wrapped;r = func(*args, **kwargs);File "/Users/abhishekchaudhary/instabase/webserver/api-server-apps/build/py/instabase/solution_utils/solution.py", line 283, in list;resp = repo_client.get_mktplace_avail_solns(req);File "/Users/abhishekchaudhary/instabase/webserver/api-server-apps/build/py/instabase/utils/rpc/client.py", line 82, in __get_proxy_method__;return self.__method_call__(method, *args, **kwargs);File "/Users/abhishekchaudhary/instabase/webserver/api-server-apps/build/py/instabase/utils/rpc/client.py", line 196, in __method_call__;raise IOError(err);OSError: Unknown exception executing method for service RepoService;```
also this is coming in api-server-apps
also no logs coming in celery-app-tasks

I am facing similar issue in server-nginx. `2021/10/14 13:08:17 [error] 19#19: *23 connect() failed (111: Connection refused) while connecting to upstream, client: 172.17.0.1, server: , request: "POST /api/v2/spans HTTP/1.1", upstream: "http://192.168.65.2:9411/api/v2/spans", host: "localhost", referrer: "https://localhost/apps/flow/edit/rahul_rawal/my-repo/fs/Instabase%20Drive/refiner-load-time/workflow.ibflow"` cc: @Yash Aggarwal
The issue is fixed temporarily by running all services as docker image. Root cause why it is not working as local is not fixed
